post.author: 임기순
post.content:
I am looking for a number of different profiles including: .Net developers, QA testers/Analysts with Network expereinces and strong C++, BSA's, BA's.
Position: Intermediate/Senior Software Developer – Infrastructure,
Location: Toronto
Reports to: Vice President, Enterprise Systems Development
Primary responsibilities:
Develop core infrastructure in xxx Portfolio in accordance with customer and internal requirements.
Develop business and technical specifications, design, code, and perform unit testing.
Communicate with other team members as required.
Lead and mentor junior staff and act as a resource to the team in the area of infrastructure development, C# and .NET .
Provide 3rd tier customer support as required.
Work independently with minimal supervision.
Experience and skills required:
Excellent knowledge of C# and object-oriented design and development
Excellent knowledge of Microsoft .NET and related technologies
Strong knowledge of database concepts, data modeling, and object relational mapping
Knowledge of user interface development principles and related Microsoft technologies (Forms, WPF)
Knowledge of all phases of the software development life cycle
Excellent communication skills
Java/J2EE, Oracle, Sybase Development
5+ years experience developing in a Unix Environment (preferably Solaris) Strong knowledge with Sybase/Oracle SQL, C, C++, Java, and J2EE technology Strong Analytical skills Familiar with Web technology(like HTML, JSP, and Struts) and CORBA technology Some familiarity with Network, Lan and TCP/IP concepts, security and communication protocol Disciplined in development methodology and software development technologies and concepts Strong troubleshooting and problem solving skills
Knowledge and experience with Derivatives applications (like Interest Rate, Equity, and Credit Derivatives) will be an asset
TECHNICAL SKILLS Excellent knowledge and experience in J2SE & J2EE technologies Advanced skills in relational database implementation, optimization and management; fluent skills in Oracle 9i and 10G, in-depth knowledge of MySQL, DB2, JDBC and CLI layers Extensive experience with JSP, Java Servlets, Javascript HTML/DHTML, XML, XPath, PHP and ASP.NET technologies Sound experience in shell scripting Comprehensive software architecture skills; design and modeling with UML Expertise with the Struts framework; deployment and maintenance of Apache server and Tomcat servlet container Adeptness with development tools such as CVS and Subversion, Apache Ant and JUnit, gcc and gnu make Proficiency with development environments such as the Eclipse platform and MS Visual Studio Fluent skills in C++, C, Perl, Python Solid grasp of software design patterns and their applications; experience with the software development lifecycle; ability to transform business requirements into applicable solutions Thorough understanding of Linux, Unix (Solaris) and Unix systems programming; programming experience in Unix (Solaris), Linux and Windows environment Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Windows 95/98/ME/2000/XP, Office Suite, MS Access, MS Visio
Regards,
Olga Kaliadina | Senior Resource Manager | Redwood Global Inc. Direct: 416.987.4006 | Cell: 416.884.8027 | Fax: 416.977.4500 | Email: okaliadina@redwoodglobal.ca
Click here to join me on LinkedIn: http://ca.linkedin.com/in/olgakaliadina
The Search Ends Here. | www.redwoodglobal.ca | 372 Bay St., Suite 1500, Toronto, ON, M5H 2W9
post.title: Intermediate/Senior Software Developer – Infrastructure
